text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/aa210a3aeccc33c6051978017959126b037f94af|patch 8.2.2272: Vim9: extend() can violate the type of a variable>
patch 8.2.2272: Vim9: extend() can violate the type of a variable

Problem:    Vim9: extend() can violate the type of a variable.
Solution:   Add the type to the dictionary or list and check items against it.
            (closes #7593)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2272: Vim9: extend() can violate the type of a variable · vim/vim@aa210a3
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2272: Vim9: extend() can violate the type of a variable · vim/vim@aa210a3
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: extend() can violate the type of a variable. Solution: Add the type to the dictionary or list and check items against it. (closes #7593)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/c368957b1904bfaa2b0b52bbcade51b20173f3ed|patch 8.2.2267: Vim9: cannot use unlet for a dict member>
patch 8.2.2267: Vim9: cannot use unlet for a dict member

Problem:    Vim9: cannot use unlet for a dict member.
Solution:   Pass GLV_NO_DECL to get_lval(). (closes #7585)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/69f7050cebb0f069d6e39571961b9bbe8531c69a|patch 8.2.2263: Vim9: compilation error with try-catch in skipped block>
patch 8.2.2263: Vim9: compilation error with try-catch in skipped block

Problem:    Vim9: compilation error with try-catch in skipped block.
Solution:   Do not bail out when generate_instr() returns NULL. (closes #7584)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2263: Vim9: compilation error with try-catch in skipped block · vim/vim@69f7050
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2263: Vim9: compilation error with try-catch in skipped block · vim/vim@69f7050
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: compilation error with try-catch in skipped block. Solution: Do not bail out when generate_instr() returns NULL. (closes #7584)
